segments.text: How can I help you today , Sir ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I set up the Personal Wealth Management Service with you , but I'm going to be travelling overseas . I'm not quite sure what I should do . I mean is it possible to still use the service ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's not a problem . You can use that service wherever you are , it doesn't matter which country you are in at the time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Really ? In that case , could I have the number of the Service Centre please ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course . It's 33234 . That will put you in touch with a Personal Banker .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And they can deal with everything ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's the beauty of the service ; they can deal with everything , with total security .
segments.speaker: S1
